title: SO2 and O2 rxn - SO2 shape

content.prompt: Which of the following gives the shape of the SO2 molecule and best helps explain why it has that shape?

choices.label: It is linear, because there are two electron domains around the sulfur atom.
It is linear, because there are three electron domains around the sulfur atom.
It is bent, because there are two electron domains around the sulfur atom.
It is bent, because there are three electron domains around the sulfur atom.

skill.text: 4.B: Explain whether a model is consistent with chemical theories.
